title: Rally Chassis
description: Explore sensor fusion using LiDAR, an Inertial Motion Unit, Intel Realsense RGBD Cameras, and a push button.

title: Fully Integrated
description: Plan routes using the latest motion planning techniques, or build your own. MuSHR has OMPL support and its own motion planner.

title: Simulation
description: See the principles of Control Theory come to life on real robotic hardware. From PID to iLQG, learn the ins and outs of robot control.
